Comment: They almost definitely just used every code in the ISO-3166 international standard. Lots of territories get their own.  St. Pierre and Miquelon is an overseas dependency of France, but it has its own code (PM). As do Heard and Mcdonald Islands (HM) and British Indian Ocean Territory (IO), which are unpopulated, hence the memes about Trump putting tariffs on penguins.   https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2:PM  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2:HM  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2:IO
